name: Space Phallus
description:
Space Phallus is a fun shoot-em-up with a retro 8 bit theme. You control the disembodied head of a dog, and fight against hordes of evil space penises. There is an online scoreboard in the game, so everyone can compete to try and become the Worlds Biggest Phallus!

It's free too, so don't feel obliged to pay anything :)
